title: Once upon a mouse
creator_credit: Gary Rocklen, Jerry Kramer and Walt Disney Animation Studios
brief_description: Excerpts from animated features, cartoon shorts and still photography are combined for a nostalgic montage of unusual beauty and emotional impact. The film segments a wide variety of Disney animated features, such as music, love, villains and happy endings.
